docs.title: Node required
docs.text:
Latest16.x 
brew install node

brew install node@16.x # (1)!
  1. Required node 16 or newer.

Note

docs.title: Help
docs.text:
v99-cli help
Show all v99-cli support commands

docs.title: Doctor
docs.text:
v99-cli doctor
Help to check your systems environment to run v99 CLI

docs.title: Link
docs.text:
v99-cli link
Open the browser that logged portal to authorize request login from V99 CLI

docs.title: Login
docs.text:
v99-cli login # (1)!
  1. Login by comand 
    v99-cli login -p="pass" -u="user"
    or 
    v99-cli login --password="pass" --user="user"

Login by user name and password to get private token + secret key for v99 SDK

docs.title: V99 Command Line Interface (CLI)
docs.text: V99 CLI is a comprehensive support system for the rapid development of V99 Mini App applications. It enables interaction with mini-app projects or portals through the v99-cli package.

docs.title: login required
docs.text:
npm login --scope=ekkkt-group --auth-type=legacy --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com
How to get an token npm?

Login in portal v99 to get user and password
